verses.verse: וַיַּ֤עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said וְהֵן֙ <S%H2005><s%> if לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> they will not יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <S%H539><s%> But behold they will not believe לִ֔י וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or יִשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> me nor hearken בְּקֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> unto my voice כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יֹֽאמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> for they will say לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not נִרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> hath not appeared אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD [מַזֶּה כ] (מַה־ זֶּ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> he ק) בְיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> able וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מַטֶּֽה׃ <S%H4294><s%> A rod

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said הַשְׁלִיכֵ֣הוּ <S%H7993><s%> Cast אַ֔רְצָה <S%H776><s%> it on the ground וַיַּשְׁלִיכֵ֥הוּ <S%H7993><s%> And he cast אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> it on the ground וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> became לְנָחָ֑שׁ <S%H5175><s%> and it became a serpent וַיָּ֥נָס <S%H5127><s%> fled מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> from before

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses שְׁלַח֙ <S%H7971><s%> Put forth יָֽדְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand וֶאֱחֹ֖ז <S%H270><s%> and take בִּזְנָב֑וֹ <S%H2180><s%> it by the tail וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> And he put forth יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> his hand וַיַּ֣חֲזֶק <S%H2388><s%> and caught בּ֔וֹ וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> became לְמַטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> it and it became a rod בְּכַפּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3709><s%> in his hand

לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of יַאֲמִ֔ינוּ <S%H539><s%> That they may believe כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נִרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> hath appeared אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers אֱלֹהֵ֧י <S%H430><s%> the God אַבְרָהָ֛ם <S%H85><s%> of Abraham אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the God יִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> of Isaac וֵאלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> and the God יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD ל֜וֹ ע֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> furthermore הָֽבֵא־ <S%H935><s%> unto him Put נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> Now יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> now thine hand בְּחֵיקֶ֔ךָ <S%H2436><s%> into thy bosom וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> And he put יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand בְּחֵיק֑וֹ <S%H2436><s%> into his bosom וַיּ֣וֹצִאָ֔הּ <S%H3318><s%> and when he took וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> it out behold his hand מְצֹרַ֥עַת <S%H6879><s%> [was] leprous כַּשָּֽׁלֶג׃ <S%H7950><s%> as snow

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הָשֵׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> again יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into חֵיקֶ֔ךָ <S%H2436><s%> into thy bosom וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> again יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into חֵיק֑וֹ <S%H2436><s%> into his bosom וַיּֽוֹצִאָהּ֙ <S%H3318><s%> and plucked מֵֽחֵיק֔וֹ <S%H2436><s%> it out of his bosom וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold שָׁ֖בָה <S%H7725><s%> and behold it was turned again כִּבְשָׂרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1320><s%> as his [other] flesh

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יַאֲמִ֣ינוּ <S%H539><s%> And it shall come to pass if they will not believe לָ֔ךְ וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> thee neither hearken לְקֹ֖ל <S%H6963><s%> to the voice הָאֹ֣ת <S%H226><s%> sign הָרִאשׁ֑וֹן <S%H7223><s%> of the first וְהֶֽאֱמִ֔ינוּ <S%H539><s%> that they will believe לְקֹ֖ל <S%H6963><s%> the voice הָאֹ֥ת <S%H226><s%> sign הָאַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <S%H314><s%> of the latter

וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> will become אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יַאֲמִ֡ינוּ <S%H539><s%> And it shall come to pass if they will not believe גַּם֩ <S%H1571><s%> even לִשְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> also these two הָאֹת֜וֹת <S%H226><s%> signs הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> or יִשְׁמְעוּן֙ <S%H8085><s%> neither hearken לְקֹלֶ֔ךָ <S%H6963><s%> unto thy voice וְלָקַחְתָּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> that thou shalt take מִמֵּימֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> of the water הַיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> of the river וְשָׁפַכְתָּ֖ <S%H8210><s%> and pour הַיַּבָּשָׁ֑ה <S%H3004><s%> [it] upon the dry וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> will become הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> [land] and the water אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> which thou takest מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> out of the river וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> will become לְדָ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> shall become blood בַּיַּבָּֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H3006><s%> upon the dry

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> O אֲדֹנָי֒ <S%H136><s%> my Lord לֹא֩ <S%H3808><s%> have never אִ֨ישׁ <S%H582><s%> not דְּבָרִ֜ים <S%H1697><s%> [am] not eloquent אָנֹ֗כִי <S%H595><s%> I גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> neither מִתְּמוֹל֙ <S%H8543><s%> before גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> nor מִשִּׁלְשֹׁ֔ם <S%H8032><s%> time גַּ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> nor מֵאָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> nor since דַּבֶּרְךָ <S%H1696><s%> thou hast spoken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servant כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for כְבַד־ <S%H3515><s%> but I [am] slow פֶּ֛ה <S%H6310><s%> of speech וּכְבַ֥ד <S%H3515><s%> and of a slow לָשׁ֖וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> I

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Who שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> unto him Who hath made פֶּה֮ <S%H6310><s%> according לָֽאָדָם֒ <S%H120><s%> man's א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> who יָשׂ֣וּם <S%H7760><s%> makes אִלֵּ֔ם <S%H483><s%> the dumb א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or חֵרֵ֔שׁ <S%H2795><s%> or deaf א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or פִקֵּ֖חַ <S%H6493><s%> or the seeing א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or עִוֵּ֑ר <S%H5787><s%> blind men הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְעַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> Now לֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go וְאָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I אֶֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> will be with פִּ֔יךָ <S%H6310><s%> and I will be with thy mouth וְהוֹרֵיתִ֖יךָ <S%H3384><s%> and teach אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what תְּדַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> thee what thou shalt say

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said בִּ֣י <S%H994><s%> O אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> my Lord שְֽׁלַֽח־ <S%H7971><s%> send נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> I pray thee by the hand תִּשְׁלָֽח׃ <S%H7971><s%> [of him whom] thou wilt send

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֨ף <S%H639><s%> And the anger יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּמֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> against Moses וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> and he said הֲלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> not אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> [Is] not Aaron אָחִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H251><s%> your brother הַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3881><s%> the Levite יָדַ֕עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for דַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> that he can speak יְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> well ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְגַ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> and moreover הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he יֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> And also behold he cometh forth לִקְרָאתֶ֔ךָ <S%H7125><s%> to meet וְרָאֲךָ֖ <S%H7200><s%> thee and when he seeth וְשָׂמַ֥ח <S%H8056><s%> glad בְּלִבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart

וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <S%H1696><s%> And thou shalt speak אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him וְשַׂמְתָּ֥ <S%H7760><s%> unto him and put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> words בְּפִ֑יו <S%H6310><s%> in his mouth וְאָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I אֶֽהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> will be with פִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H6310><s%> and I will be with thy mouth וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with פִּ֔יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> and with his mouth וְהוֹרֵיתִ֣י <S%H3384><s%> and will teach אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <S%H6213><s%> you what ye shall do

וְדִבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> And he shall be thy spokesman ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לְךָ֖ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people וְהָ֤יָה <S%H1961><s%> become הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לְּךָ֣ לְפֶ֔ה <S%H6310><s%> and he shall be [even] he shall be to thee instead of a mouth וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you תִּֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לּ֥וֹ לֵֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> and thou shalt be to him instead of God

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּטֶּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> this rod הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this תִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> And thou shalt take בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> in thine hand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> wherewith thou shalt do בּ֖וֹ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֹתֹֽת׃ <S%H226><s%> signs פ

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וַיָּ֣שָׁב ׀ <S%H7725><s%> and returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and יֶ֣תֶר <S%H3503><s%> And Jethro חֹֽתְנ֗וֹ <S%H2859><s%> his father in law וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לוֹ֙ אֵ֣לְכָה <S%H1980><s%> go נָּ֗א <S%H4994><s%> Please וְאָשׁ֙וּבָה֙ <S%H7725><s%> I pray thee and return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַחַ֣י <S%H251><s%> unto my brethren אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> which [are] in Egypt וְאֶרְאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> and see הַעוֹדָ֣ם <S%H5750><s%> whether they be yet חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> alive וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִתְר֛וֹ <S%H3503><s%> and Jethro לְמֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> to Moses לֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> in peace

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses בְּמִדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> in Midian לֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Go שֻׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> return מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֙תוּ֙ <S%H4191><s%> are dead כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> for all the men הַֽמְבַקְשִׁ֖ים <S%H1245><s%> which sought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> thy life

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָ֗יו <S%H1121><s%> and his sons וַיַּרְכִּבֵם֙ <S%H7392><s%> and set עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֲמֹ֔ר <S%H2543><s%> them upon an ass וַיָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> and he returned אַ֣רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> took מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> the rod הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand
